Callback7Header: Slay the monsters at the Sealed Door
Name: The Sealed Door
Phase0Description:
I learned of an impending catastrophe from an odd man in Lower Kyovashad.

I should search the Frigid Expanse for this strange sealed door.
Phase8Description: I found the door of which the beggar spoke. It appears to be a prison of some kind, containing an evil spirit. Sure enough, the Khazra are trying to breach it.
Toast: An eccentric stranger is convinced of a catastrophe about to occur.
